Indian Economy.title: P&G succession: Let’s applaud the Indian diaspora’s success but also look within
Indian Economy.summary: Shailesh Jejurikar, an executive of Indian origin, is set to reach the top of P&G. This is good news, not ‘brain drain’, but comes amid a trend of outmigration that provokes a few hard questions about India’s economic dynamism.

Indian Economy.title: Gold snaps 5-day losing run; climbs ₹700 to ₹98,520/10 g
Indian Economy.summary: Gold is trading flat as investors await a slate of key US macroeconomic data, including Q2 GDP, ADP employment, pending home sales, and Federal Open Market Committee (FOMC) interest rate decision

Indian Economy.title: Trump’s tariff move on Indian goods sparks industry dismay
Indian Economy.summary: US President Trump's 25% tariff on Indian goods sparks industry dismay, warnings of economic impact and sector-specific challenges.

Indian Economy.title: India is not creating meaningful employment
Indian Economy.summary: Recent employment figures conceal the precarity, informality and invisibilised realities of India’s struggling workforce

Indian Economy.title: Trump’s 25% tariffs cast shadow over Indian exports
Indian Economy.summary: Industry experts express concern over US tariffs on Indian goods, urging India to prioritize national interests in trade negotiations.

Stock Market.title: Sensex gains 191 points amid mixed signals as Fed decision looms
Stock Market.summary: Sensex rose 190.72 points or 0.23% to 81,528.67 and the Nifty agined 49.30 points or 0.20% to 24,870.40 as of 12.55 PM

Stock Market.summary: Sensex gained 181.02 pts or 0.22% to 81,518.97 at 1.01 pm after a muted opening. Nifty 50 was up by 45.00 pts or 0.18% to 24,866.10

Banking & Finance.summary: NBFC expects 10-15 bp improvement in its gross stage 3 or bad loan ratio by FY26 end

Banking & Finance.title: Revised norms for substantial interest, settlement of unclaimed amount under banking law to take effect from Aug 1
Banking & Finance.summary: The Banking Laws (Amendment) Act, 2025 raises interest threshold to ₹2 crore and expand scope of funds to be transferred to IEPF, among others

Banking & Finance.title: Tata Trusts to Tata Sons: Try everything to stay private, consider exit for SP Group
Banking & Finance.summary: Finally, Tata Trusts makes its view clear on a potential listing of Tata Sons. Also, for the first time, Tata Trusts has expressed its willingness to let the SP Group exit Tata Sons. What's next for Tata Sons?

Banking & Finance.title: Best mutual funds: These 15 sectoral, thematic schemes gave over 30% annualised return in the past 5 years
Banking & Finance.summary: Best mutual funds: Sectoral funds invest in a particular sector of the economy such as infra, banking, technology and pharmaceuticals whereas thematic funds select stocks of companies in industries which belong to a particular theme

Banking & Finance.title: Turnaround Hopes Lift SocGen to 2011 Highs Ahead of 2Q Report
Banking & Finance.summary: Societe Generale SA shares hit their highest intra-day levels since 2011, a day ahead of the publication of the French banking group’s second-quarter results as hopes about Chief Executive Officer Slawomir Krupa’s turnaround plan gained further traction.

Technology Sector.title: Devina Mehra: The Indian IT services model has finally begun to falter… or has it?
Technology Sector.summary: Mass layoffs by IT major TCS have caused a stir, with many speculating that the sector is in a doom spiral. But we mustn’t confuse layoffs with the health of the IT services business. These companies are adapting to an AI shift in a display of tech resilience.

Technology Sector.title: Infosys Jobs: IT-major to hire 20,000 freshers this year. Here's what CEO Salil Parekh says
Technology Sector.summary: Infosys Jobs: India's second-largest IT firm, Infosys CEO, highlighted that the company will hire 20,000 freshers right out of college amid the layoff scares of the Indian IT industry.

Technology Sector.title: Indian-origin Nikhil Ravishankar to lead Air New Zealand
Technology Sector.summary: Indian-origin Nikhil Ravishankar appointed CEO of Air New Zealand, bringing digital expertise and innovation to the airline industry.

Technology Sector.title: Power buzz: We can’t ignore what it costs to carry renewable energy
Technology Sector.summary: A buzz of debate hovers over India’s decision to end its waiver of transmission charges for wind and solar energy projects. But this policy had led to distortions of this sector and was proving financially untenable. Here’s a close look.
